4. File Formats

4.1. Overview

The file formats used are summarised below.

Name Purpose
INI defines initialisation data
SDG defines formatting rules for sdfget
TBL defines a table

Further details on these are provided below.

Note: sdm, sds and sdn files are normal SDF files used for normal modules, style modules and tuning modules respectively.

INI Format

SDG Format

TBL Format
